summary: This document appears to be an FBI 302 report prepared by an AUSA for trial testimony, containing previously undisclosed or clarified recollections from a witness regarding interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, including details about payments for massages and his behavior.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references his behavior during massages, including inviting others to join him and paying for services.

events.title: Witness recollection of massages with Epstein
events.description: A witness recalls being paid for massages, with Epstein sometimes inviting others to join him during sessions where he would shower or steam beforehand.

keyFacts: A witness does not remember exactly how much she was paid when photos were taken of her.
The witness thought Epstein looked between 28 and 34 years old.
Epstein would shower or steam before massages and sometimes invited others to join him.
The witness believes she received up to $500 for some massages.
